Name: Establishing separate units of appropriation for uniformed personnel overtime in the city budget.
Title: A Local Law in relation to establishing separate units of appropriation for uniformed personnel overtime in the city budget.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Finance
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
 
	Section 1.  Notwithstanding any provision of law to the contrary, and consistent with the authority of the council pursuant to section 107 and 254 of the charter, there shall be established in the fiscal year 2008 budget separate units of appropriation within each agency for uniformed personnel overtime, which shall correspond to each particular program, purpose, activity or responsibility within such agency.   
	Â§2.	This local law shall take effect immediately.

TT 07-28-06
